translations: adj.确信的；可靠的；必定的（sure 的变形）

sentences.sentence: No—ride thy mule, and lead thine ass; I am surer on mine own feet, and will walk.
sentences.translation: 不——你骑你的骡子，牵你的驴吧；我更相信自己的脚，宁愿走路。

sentences.sentence: Its performance this time was swifter and surer.
sentences.translation: 这一次其表现更迅捷，更可靠。

sentences.sentence: There is no surer way to feed Japanese insecurities.
sentences.translation: 日本由此丧失了安全感，要消除这种感觉可不容易。
